item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump calls for special prosecutor for 2020 election
item.description: Trump took to Truth Social Friday morning to again make unverified claims that the 2020 election was fraudulent and called for a special prosecutor.

item.title: Mahmoud Khalil ordered released by federal judge
item.description: A federal judge has ordered the release of Columbia University pro-Palestinian activist Mahmoud Khalil.

item.title: WATCH: ‘I’m pretty lucky’: Teen struck by lightning as thunderstorms hit Northeast
item.description: In New York City, a teenager was struck by lightning in Central Park Thursday afternoon, police said. The boy is alert and conscious, police said.

item.title: Israel-Iran live updates: Iranian FM open to continue discussions after Geneva talks
item.description: UK, France and Germany said there were no major breakthroughs on Friday.

item.title: Trump seeks to delay appeal of $83 million judgment in E. Jean Carroll case
item.description: President Trump has asked an appeals court to delay arguments scheduled for next week in his appeal of the $83 million defamation case brought by E. J...
